name: Association of Professionals Against Gender Based Violence
goal:
This is an Association founded by a team of professionals who offer support advice & assistance those who have suffered gender based violence.

We Accredit Represent and Support our Members to ensure best practice in the goal to prevent and end all forms of Gender Based Violence. We promote the highest professional standards in provision of support and protection for vistims but also in legal and medical assessments, treatment and report writing for victims.

Our Services:
1. Management and tendering
2. Legal Services
3. Medical Assessments and Referrals
4. Training
5. Research & Development
6. Guidance
7. Therapeutic Counselling
8. Reconstruction/Cosmetic surgery
9. Social and welfare

We accredit represent and Support our Members to ensure best practice in the goal to prevent and end all forms of Gender Based Violence. We promote the highest professional standards in provision of support and protection for victims but also in legal and medical assessments, treatment and report writing for victims - All in order to elevate victims to a place of safety and self empowerment.
interests: Communication, Culture, Education and training, Justice and Fundamental Rights
